alert.note: Alert for Dodge; Washington (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 20 at 1:49PM CDT by NWS Milwaukee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Washington and southeastern Dodge Counties through 230 PM CDT... At 149 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Hustisford, or near Juneau, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... West Bend, Mequon, Hartford, Jackson, Slinger, Horicon, Juneau, Germantown, Newburg, Hustisford, Iron Ridge, Richfield, Addison, Rubicon, Lebanon, Woodland, Neosho, Clyman, Nenno and Keowns. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
